title: Craptop crashed while 8.5 patch was going through.
body:
First of all, lmao Riot. Why are messages from 2 years ago appearing (ARE YOU KIDDING ME RIOT) as recent? Funny how I come full circle to patch problems but this time it's not your old buggy client; it is my garbo laptop.

Speaking of, I'm guessing I need to uninstall/reinstall? Client is now corrupted if I try to open it (I get an alert that says so).

Thanks for dealing with my crap.

P.S. Stop nerfing Ahri and Shyvana, LUL

replies.body:
Hey Jun Long,

If you can actually get into the client, try clicking the gearbox and then clicking _"Initiate Full Repair"_. If you're unable to do that though, then the next best course of action is installing and running the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool). Then once you're in the Hextech Repair Tool, select "Force Repatch" and click start.

Re-installing will probably fix the problem too, but the Hextech Repair Tool might save you a complete re-install if the issue can be fixed with just a repatch.

Let me know if you run into any issues :D

P.S The messages aren't from 2 years ago, Riot's testing their new Zilean-tech in the client this patch. It sends everyone 2 years back in time, so make sure you buy some Bitcoin while you're there ;)
I'm trying to play a game. I queue. I pick a champ. Then we go into loading screen and it is black.{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} MAC

Have you enabled low spec mode and disabled animations? If you haven't then disable them in settings, and enter a custom game to see if it loads. There's a handy video [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_cq2vPiYULU) if you're not sure about how to disable low spec mode. 

If that doesn't work, then let me know, I might have to ask a Wrenchmen to help you out :)
